name: youngblood
description: A simple game development framework for web browsers.

scripts.clean: shx rm -rf bundles lib lib-esm typings
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && tsc -m es6 --outDir lib-esm && webpack --env.mode=development
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && tsc && tsc -m es6 --outDir lib-esm && webpack --env.mode=production

author: Zsombor Zolt√°n Berki
